name: Recordable Piano
description: This is a piano app I made which mimics part of the software I use to make music. The piano can be played using a keyboard and recorded in real-time. Users can also access a cloud service to save projects.

name: OpenAI Image Gen GUI
description: An extra credit assignment for my Object-Oriented class that generates images using Open AI's API. The assignment implementation used Java Swing and I later recreated the app using React.

name: Blog Website
description: A blog website with a full CMS connected to an SQL server. User's can make accounts allowing them to like, comment, and subscribe to email notifications. Currently in development.
